reviewText: gift for a male family member who loves animals & the outdoors so this was the perfect gift!

Perhaps the best of all the programs about wildlife.  Marty Stouffer is very knowledgeable of American wildlife and has captured outstanding footage for presentation.  I only wish the show had continued on for many more years.  5 stars!!!!
You can't beat the price for all these hours of Stouffery amazingness. We have an annual Wild America marathon up at the cabin where the DVDs play nightly.
Loved these when it was a TV show. So did my kids.good family entertainment.
